snippet: SOMERSTEIN--Dr. Saul, 90, died on February 3, 2016 at his home. Saul was a devoted husband, father, and grandfather who loved his family unconditionally. He served in the 100th Infantry Division during WWII and later attended NYU Dental School. Many of his patients went on to become lifelong friends of the family. Service at Gutterman's Funeral Home, 8000 Jericho Turnpike, Friday at 11:00am. Our loss will be felt by all who knew him. 1/3
lead_paragraph: SOMERSTEIN--Dr. Saul, 90, died on February 3, 2016 at his home. Saul was a devoted husband, father, and grandfather who loved his family unconditionally. He served in the 100th Infantry Division during WWII and later attended NYU Dental School. Many of his patients went on to become lifelong friends of the family. Service at Gutterman's Funeral Home, 8000 Jericho Turnpike, Friday at 11:00am. Our loss will be felt by all who knew him. 1/3
